item.title: got a Pasmo
item.description: 09:38 Saturday 12 November 2016 JST Now that I found my Suica, I intended to use it as a commuter pass again. I’ve had this Suica card for ages, but now that we live on an Odakyu Line, I just got a Pasmo card to act as my teiki, all the way from新百合ヶ丘駅 to 登戸駅 (the only segment I consistently take 5 times per week).
